#summary A guide to install and configure Tonatiuh's development environment on OpenSolaris.

= Tonatiuh's development set up for !OpenSolaris =

Instructions on how to install in a PC running OpenSolaris the libraries and programs needed to build Tonatiuh from source files.

= Details =

Follow the links in the order listed and they will guide you through the different phases of the process:
  * [InstallingQtForOpenSolaris Installing Qt]
  * [InstallingSimageForOpenSolaris Installing Simage]
  * [InstallingCoin3DForOpenSolaris Installing Coin3D]
  * [InstallingSoQtForOpenSolaris Installing SoQt]
  * [InstallingMarbleForOpenSolaris Installing Marble]
  * [InstallingBerkeleyDBForOpenSolaris Installing Berkeley DB]
  * [BuildingTonatiuhOnOpenSolaris Building Tonatiuh and plugins]
